AT.name: Creeping Terror
AT.description: Gefangen unterhalb eines gruseligen verlassenen Anwesens tief im Wald, wird eine Gruppe von Freunden von einem schrecklichen Monster verfolgt. Um die Geheimnisse des Anwesen zu enthüllen und einen Fluchtweg zu finden, muss Arisa ihren Verstand und ihre Umgebung nutzen ... bevor es zu spät ist.

AU.name: Creeping Terror
AU.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

BG.name: Creeping Terror
BG.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

BE.name: Creeping Terror
BE.description: Pris au piège sous un sinistre manoir abandonné au plus profond d’une forêt, un groupe d'amis cherche à fuir un monstre terrifiant. Grâce à sa vivacité d’esprit et son environnement, Arisa va devoir élucider les secrets du manoir et découvrir comment s’enfuir avant qu’il ne soit trop tard...

ES.name: Creeping Terror
ES.description: Atrapados bajo una espeluznante mansión abandonada en el corazón del bosque, un grupo de amigos tiene que escapar de un monstruo aterrador. Utilizando su ingenio y lo que encuentra a su alrededor, Arisa deberá desentrañar los secretos de la mansión y averiguar cómo escapar... antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

HU.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

IT.name: Creeping Terror
IT.description: Un gruppo di amici intrappolato sotto una spettrale villa abbandonata nel profondo della foresta si trova a dover fuggire da un mostro terrificante. Usando solo l'ingegno e gli oggetti che la circondano, Arisa dovrà scoprire i segreti della villa e trovare un modo per fuggire... prima che sia troppo tardi!

LT.name: Creeping Terror

NO.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

NL.name: Creeping Terror
NL.description: Een groep vrienden, die gevangen is onder een enge, verlaten villa, is op de vlucht voor een verschrikkelijk monster. Arisa gebruikt haar gezonde verstand en haar omgeving om de geheimen van de villa te ontdekken en erachter te komen hoe ze kunnen ontsnappen... voordat het te laat is.

NZ.name: Creeping Terror
NZ.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

PL.name: Creeping Terror
PL.description: Trapped below a creepy abandoned mansion deep in the forest, a group of friends find themselves on the run from a terrifying monster. Using only her wits and what's around her, Arisa must uncover the secrets of the mansion, and figure out how to escape...before it's too late.

PT.name: Creeping Terror
PT.description: Encurralados numa assustadora mansão abandonada nas profundezas da floresta, um grupo de amigos dá por si em fuga de um terrível monstro. Utilizando apenas a sua astúcia e o que se encontra à sua volta, Arisa tem de desvendar os segredos da mansão e descobrir como escapar... Antes que seja demasiado tarde.

RU.name: Creeping Terror
RU.description: Запертые под жутким покинутым особняком глубоко в лесу, друзья вынуждены спасаться от ужасающего чудовища. Используя лишь свою сообразительность и подручные предметы, Ариса должна раскрыть тайны особняка и найти способ вырваться из него… пока не будет слишком поздно.
